languages.text: {n}Нити на шеях пленных чуть расслабляются.{/n} "Смилуйтесь! Мы просто работники техтуннелей. Был отдан приказ перекрыть вентиляционный шлюз в реакторную. Мол, утечка испарений. Разве ж мы могли знать?! А то, что оружие в руках было, ну это... как бы..." {n}Женщина нервно расчесывает щеку.{/n}

{n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

Мол, утечка испарений. Разве ж мы могли знать?! А то, что оружие в руках было, ну это... как бы..." {n}Женщина нервно расчесывает щеку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The strings around the captives' necks slacken a little.{/n} "Have mercy! We are simple technical tunnel workers. We had orders to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. How could we have known? And as for us holding weapons, that was... you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

Fume leakage, supposedly. How could we have known? And as for us holding weapons, that was... you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les cultistes desserrent légèrement les cordes enroulées autour du cou des prisonniers pour leur permettre de parler.{/n} « Pitié ! On est que des ouvriers affectés à l'entretien technique des tunnels. On nous a dit de bloquer le conduit d'aération qui mène à la salle du réacteur, soi-disant à cause d'une fuite. On savait pas qu'on faisait quelque chose de mal, on faisait que suivre les ordres ! Quant à la raison pour laquelle on portait des armes, c'était pour... vous savez... » {n}Elle se frotte nerveusement la joue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les cultistes desserrent légèrement les cordes enroulées autour du cou des prisonniers pour leur permettre de parler.{/n} « Pitié ! On est que des ouvriers affectés à l'entretien technique des tunnels. On nous a dit de bloquer le conduit d'aération qui mène à la salle du réacteur, soi-disant à cause d'une fuite. On savait pas qu'on faisait quelque chose de mal, on faisait que suivre les ordres ! Quant à la raison pour laquelle on portait des armes, c'était pour... vous savez... » {n}Elle se frotte nerveusement la joue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Los hilos que rodean los cuellos de los prisioneros se aflojan lo estrictamente necesario para permitirles hablar.{/n} «¡Tenga piedad! Solo somos trabajadores de los túneles técnicos. Nos dijeron que bloqueáramos el conducto de ventilación que conducía a la sala del reactor. Por una fuga de humos, en teoría. No sabíamos que eso era un peligro; ¡solo seguíamos órdenes! En cuando a las armas, es porque... bueno, ya sabe...». {n}La mujer se rasca la mejilla, nerviosa.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

Solo somos trabajadores de los túneles técnicos. Nos dijeron que bloqueáramos el conducto de ventilación que conducía a la sala del reactor. Por una fuga de humos, en teoría. No sabíamos que eso era un peligro; ¡solo seguíamos órdenes! En cuando a las armas, es porque... bueno, ya sabe...». {n}La mujer se rasca la mejilla, nerviosa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}绮贝菈稍微松开了俘虏脖子上的丝线，刚好允许他们说话。{/n}“发发慈悲吧，大人！我们不过是普通的管道工人而已。上级告诉我们说要堵住通往反应堆室的通风井，说是发生了油烟泄漏。我们根本不知道我们做错了什么，我们仅仅是在服从命令而已！至于我们为什么会拿着武器……这是因为……呃，你明白吧……”{n}女人紧张地挠着脸颊。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}绮贝菈稍微松开了俘虏脖子上的丝线，刚好允许他们说话。{/n}“发发慈悲吧，大人！我们不过是普通的管道工人而已。上级告诉我们说要堵住通往反应堆室的通风井，说是发生了油烟泄漏。我们根本不知道我们做错了什么，我们仅仅是在服从命令而已！至于我们为什么会拿着武器……这是因为……呃，你明白吧……”{n}女人紧张地挠着脸颊。{/n}

languages.text: {n}囚人たちの首にかけられた紐は、彼らが言葉を発せるだけ、緩められた。{/n} 「慈悲を！私たちはただのトンネル作業員です。原子炉室に通じる換気シャフトを塞ぐように言われたのです。煙の漏れが原因らしい。自分たちが悪いことをしているとは知らなかったんです―言う通りにしただけですから！そして、なぜ武器を持っていたかというと、それは…その…」{n}女性は緊張し頬をかいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}囚人たちの首にかけられた紐は、彼らが言葉を発せるだけ、緩められた。{/n} 「慈悲を！私たちはただのトンネル作業員です。原子炉室に通じる換気シャフトを塞ぐように言われたのです。煙の漏れが原因らしい。自分たちが悪いことをしているとは知らなかったんです―言う通りにしただけですから！そして、なぜ武器を持っていたかというと、それは…その…」{n}女性は緊張し頬をかいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die Drähte um die Hälse der Gefangenen werden gerade genug gelockert, damit sie sprechen können.{/n} "Habt Gnade! Wir sind nur technische Tunnelarbeiter. Man hat uns befohlen, den Luftschaft zu blockieren, der zum Reaktorraum führt. Wegen ausgetretener Dämpfe, angeblich. Wir wussten nicht, dass wir etwas Unrechtes tun, wir haben nur Befehle befolgt! Und warum wir Waffen bei uns hatten, das war ... nun ja, wisst Ihr ..." {n}Die Frau kratzt sich nervös an der Wange.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cords around the prisoners' necks are loosened just enough to let them speak.{/n} "Have mercy! We're just technical tunnel workers. We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}

Man hat uns befohlen, den Luftschaft zu blockieren, der zum Reaktorraum führt. Wegen ausgetretener Dämpfe, angeblich. Wir wussten nicht, dass wir etwas Unrechtes tun, wir haben nur Befehle befolgt! Und warum wir Waffen bei uns hatten, das war ... nun ja, wisst Ihr ..." {n}Die Frau kratzt sich nervös an der Wange.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Mahkûmların boyunlarını saran kablolar, sadece konuşmalarına müsaade edecek gevşeklikte.{/n} "Merhamet edin! Biz yalnızca teknik tünel işçileriyiz. Bize reaktör odasına çıkan havalandırma şaftını engellememiz söylendi. Sözüm ona duman sızıntısı varmış. Yanlış bir şey yaptığımızı bilmiyorduk. Yalnızca emirlere itaat ediyorduk! Neden elimizde silah olduğu konusu ise... İşte, bileceğiniz üzere..." {n}Kadın, gergin bir şekilde yanağını tırmalıyor.{/n}

We were told to block the ventilation shaft leading into the reactor room. Fume leakage, supposedly. We didn't know we were doing anything wrong — we were just following orders! And as for why we were holding weapons, that was... well, you know..." {n}The woman scratches her cheek nervously.{/n}
